    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>

            <catalog>CFL</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">The Workers’ Mobility Freedom Principle - Listening Comprehension</string>
            <string language="en">The Workers' Mobility Freedom Principle - Listening comprehension</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Grundregel Freiheit Mobilität der Arbeiter -
hörendes Erfassen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le principe de liberté de la mobilité des 
ouvriers - compréhension d'écoute</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O princípio da liberdade da mobilidade dos 
trabalhadores - compreensão escutando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il principio di libertà di mobilità degli 
operai - comprensione ascoltante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η αρχή ελευθερίας κινητικότητας των εργαζομένων - 
κατανόηση ακούσματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El principio de la libertad de la movilidad de 
los trabajadores - comprensión que escucha</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Read and listen to both of the sections of the text about the workers’ mobility freedom principle. Then complete the text by writing the missing words in the blanks.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 7 - How Does It Work?</string>
            <string language="en">Read and listen to both of the sections of the text about the workers' mobility freedom principle. Then complete the text by writing the missing words in the blanks. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 7 - How Does It Work?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">work</string>
            <string language="sv">job</string>
            <string language="sv">professions</string>
            <string language="sv">occupations</string>
            <string language="sv">workplace</string>
            <string language="sv">workers' mobility</string>
            <string language="sv">Europe</string>
            <string language="sv">E.U</string>
            <string language="sv">movement</string>
            <string language="sv">freedom principle</string>
            <string language="sv">reading comprehension</string>
            <string language="sv">listening comprehension</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">work</string>
            <string language="en">job</string>
            <string language="en">professions</string>
            <string language="en">occupations</string>
            <string language="en">workplace</string>
            <string language="en">workers' mobility</string>
            <string language="en">Europe</string>
            <string language="en">EU</string>
            <string language="en">movement</string>
            <string language="en">freedom principle</string>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
            <string language="en">listening comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesen Sie und hören Sie zu beiden der Kapitel 
des Textes über die Grundregel Freiheit Mobilität der Arbeiter. 
Führen Sie dann den Text durch, indem Sie die fehlenden Wörter
in die Leerzeichen schreiben. Safir - Englisch und Berufsleben 
für Anfänger - Modul 7 - wie funktioniert es?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lisez et écoutez toutes les deux sections du 
texte au sujet du principe de liberté de la mobilité des ouvriers. 
Remplissez alors le texte en écrivant les mots manquants dans 
les blancs. Safir - l'anglais et vie active pour des débutants 
- module 7 - comment fonctionne-t-cela ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Leia e escute ambas as seções do texto sobre o 
princípio da liberdade da mobilidade dos trabalhadores. Termine
então o texto escrevendo as palavras faltantes nos espaços em 
branco. Safir - vida do inglês e de funcionamento para novatos 
- módulo 7 - como trabalha?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Legga ed ascolti entrambe le sezioni del testo 
circa il principio di libertà di mobilità degli operai. Allora
completi il testo scrivendo le parole mancanti negli spazii in bianco.
Safir - inglese e vita attiva per i principianti - modulo 7 - 
come funziona?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαβάστε και ακούστε και τα δύο από τα τμήματα του 
κειμένου για την αρχή ελευθερίας κινητικότητας των εργαζομένων. 
Κατόπιν συμπληρώστε το κείμενο με το γράψιμο των 
ελλειπουσών λέξεων στα κενά. Safir - αγγλική και 
οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 7 - πώς 
λειτουργεί;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lea y escuche ambas secciones del texto sobre el 
principio de la libertad de la movilidad de los trabajadores. 
Entonces termine el texto escribiendo las palabras que falta en 
los espacios en blanco. ¿Safir - inglés y vida laboral para los
principiantes - módulo 7 - cómo trabaja?</string>
          </description>
